summary: WAS DRIVING AND WOULD LOOSE POWER AND SLOW WAY DOWN THEN POWER WOULD COME BACK.  COULD GET BACK TO HIGHWAY SPEED THEN LOOSE POWER AGAIN.  I WAD ABLE TO GET HOME.  ONCE I STOPPED ENGINE IT WOULD NOT RESTART.  HAD TOWED TO FORD DEALER FOR REPAIRS.  WAS TOLD IT IS A KNOWN ISSUE THAT THE FUSE IS TOO SMALL AND HAS TO BE REWIRED.  THIS IS A DESIGN FLAW AND SAFETY ISSUE.  FORD SHOULD HAVE TO RECALL AND FIX IT.  THIS COST ME $430 TO HAVE REPAIRED.
